Description

AuditBase
The BaseEntity class is a base class that provides common auditing fields for entities, such as the user who created or last updated the entity, and the respective timestamps.
AuditBaseEntity
The BaseEntity class is a base class that provides common auditing fields for entities, such as the user who created or last updated the entity, and the respective timestamps.
AuditEntityListener
AuditEntityListener automatically manages auditing for entities extending AuditBaseEntity.
